Row.Text: This is a wonderful agreement. You are truly full of wisdom.
That is a good bargain. I accept.
I am not happy with this agreement, but I cannot deny my neighbor.
I can agree to those terms. I accept.
You have the advantage here. We will do as you ask.
I can sign off on this one.
You make a compelling case. We'll check the box on this one.
All right, we'll bite the bullet on this one.
This looks good. I say yes. Que bom.
This will be... useful... ish. We accept your offer.
This looks like a good deal to me.
This looks acceptable to me.
See, Lena, in contrast to your wardrobe, we can agree on some things.
This is a good offer, and I would be foolish to reject it.
Let us gaze into the universal divinity and commune with the mother, in our agreement.
In the name of the Protectorate, I humbly accept your offer.
I will accept your offer, and pray it grants you the wisdom to reclaim your heritage.
To deny you is to deny the past. We must accept it, and your offer.
Yes, we'd like to move forward with this. I'm always interested in improving the state of the colony.
You're too kind to me, cousin. Many thanks. I'll try to return the favor soon. France is bacon.
I don’t know why I even encourage your misguided ways, but if this is the deal you want, this is what you'll get. France is bacon.
I think that you're finally coming around to common sense. I'm happy to make this agreement.
You seem to have a better handle on this new planet, and I will follow your lead in trade.
Yes, let's do it. It's a privilege to accept an offer from you.
Yes, I can agree to that. You've got yourself a deal.
All right, I guess you've got yourself a deal.
Aye, that’s a fine offer and I'm happy to say yes. If only the rest of this job was that easy, right?
Of course, of course! You didn't think I'd turn that down, did you?
We are humbled by your generosity. Thank you, and let us continue to build on this work.
And that is a reasonable offer. I accept.
It's not the best offer we've received, but it will do. We accept your offer.
We accept your proposal. It's a relief to have such a level-headed trading partner.
An excellent offer. Thank you for letting us partake. Of course we accept, and look forward to the next agreement.
That's a beauty... oh and the agreement, too.
This is good. I accept. What's next?
We accept your offer/qualify your proposal.
Negotiation is always welcome. What should we consider?
Hah! You're thinking that will make ammends?
This is your offer?
So, do you have something?
And this is the optimal trade agreement, calculated by your super-AI?
So, what are you thinking?
Let's talk turkey.
The American Reclamation Corporation has what you need.
Let me take a look at that.
So, you are ready with your offer?
Are you sure?
For real?
Oh, is that what you're after?
What is your offer, then? We will listen, and strive for understanding.
I like your proposal enough to sign off on it. Let's build on the momentum of this agreement, shall we?
I'm just lucky you're considering an offer.
That's it, then? Are you sure? Because once you've offered, you can't take it back.
All right, if you insist. What's it going to be this time, then? Energy for nothing? Food for almost nothing?
I can't wait to see what you've got to offer. I'm sure it'll be good.
Let me know when you're done, I'll be over here waiting for you.
Have you decided on that? Yes? No?
What would you like to offer?
See something you like?
What's on your mind?
This is it?
Final/complete?
I'm glad you also saw the wisdom in it. Thank you.
May peace guide you as your wisdom guides your decisions.
I'm glad we could reach an agreement.
Good! I'm happy to shake hands with you.
You have chosen wisely.
Marvelous.
See, it is possible for us to be civil with one another.
In this, you provide for your colony, and I for mine.
Good! This is one step of the process of progress. The more agreements we make, the more Transmodern we become.
You made the right decision, trust me. We'll both be reaping the benefits, soon.
Oh, good, you accepted. I'm sure you realized what a great offer it was.
Great minds, mate. Great minds.
We agree. Let's move on.
Agreed/transaction. We approve/support your decision.
Tell me, friend, is this not a bargain?
I've been thinking about this deal for some time. What do you think?
I would like to propose this deal, for the better of both our people.
This world provides for all, but perhaps you need our help.
We have this opportUnity for you. What's your take?
We're going to let you in on this deal…
These are good terms, no?
We assembled this agreement for your eyes only. What are your thoughts?
You can trust us.
This agreement would be beneficial to both of us.
This is to my liking, what do you think, dear?
Hate to interrupt, but this couldn't wait.
Take this is as an offering to the cosmos, and to you, a benefit to divinity.
May we both be blessed by this agreement.
Here is our proposal. It's as good a deal as you're going to get from anyone. Take your time to look it over.
All right, so what do you think about this proposal, then? It'll help both of us, that's for sure.
All right, what do you think about this, then? A fine offer, don't you say?
Why not consider this trade? I think it'll help both of us, right?
This agreement is practically guaranteed to benefit both of our colonies. So, of course you will accept?
How long is it since I bothered you? About something important and real?
I've got a proposal with your beautiful name written all over it.
Boy, do I have a deal for you…
All I'm offering you is the truth, nothing more… oh and this.
Now, this is an offer.
I propose this agreement. Do you accept?
Decision proposed/offered. What is your input?
I am open to trade, but not on those terms.
I am reasonable. I can find common ground, but this is unacceptable.
You are dreaming if you think I would ever accept that proposal.
I don't understand why, but my advisors are against your proposal.
No, that is not a good deal.
No, I will not sacrifice my people for your gain.
This is a good offer, but my advisors… they insist on declining.
We'll have to pass on this one.
You'll have to incentivize this if you want me to take it seriously.
That is completely off the table.
No, no. This will not do.
This is not in our best interests.
This doesn't work for me.
Oh, I simply can't.
Poppycock, if I dare say so myself.
I didn't need to spend my youth in a courtroom to recognize attempted robbery when I see it.
I'm sorry, but we must seek another way if we are to reach an agreement.
As the demon of nihility entropifies the universe, so will you use this agreement. I cannot agree
I'm interested in the proposal, but not the details. Come back when you have a better offer.
It's for the sake of your parents that I even entertain these foolish notions of yours. Accepting them, though, is a whole different matter. France is bacon.
I'm sorry, dear, but it's not personal. I wouldn't say yes to this deal regardless of who presented it.
I'm sorry, Premier Élodie, but I can't accept your proposal. My hands are tied. You know how these things are.
I can't believe I'm saying this, but I'm going to have to reject your offer.
This one's an easy answer for me, and the answer is no.
Of course not! What made you think I'd go along with that idea?
I hate to turn down a friend, but that offer's just not good enough.
I'm afraid I have to turn this down. Sorry about that, but maybe next time?
Your offer was exceptional, but we do not have the resources to finalize that deal. Our apologies.
That proposal is just not acceptable. I'm sorry but you'll have to do better.
Did you take any time to analyze that offer? It's not very good. We'll have to see it improved before we can seriously consider it.
Your offer was fair, but we are interested in other areas right now. Hopefully next time we can agree.
I am very sorry, but we have to politely decline.
I'm not interested in that, but I have a few other things in mind…
I'm normally an agreeable person, but that's just too much.
You call that an offer? That's not an offer.
This is not good. I cannot accept it.
No/negative. We do not accept this agreement. Offer rejected.
I'm sorry you cannot see the wisdom in my offer, but perhaps you will one day.
I will not beg you. If you don't like it, I will go elsewhere.
Is this how you sleepers do business?
This is a minor setback, but we'll get over it.
I guess that wasn't in the cards. We'll bring more to the table next time.
A shame, I thought we could agree on that.
You have chosen poorly.
Very well, if you must be difficult…
Well that was certainly less than kind, cousin.
I understand you aren't ready to trade. I will wait until you are.
That offer was as good as any you're going to receive. Power-based policymaking failed a long time ago, and yet you're still repeating those mistakes.
And you think I'm the difficult one. I have no problem finding common ground in other diplomatic arrangements…
I'm not fond of turning down a good offer, but it seems you have no problem with it.
So, you are not interested in deals that will benefit you, your colony, and your future settlements?
Playing hard to get, are we?
That was a good offer, but you don't want it. Very well.
We are disappoint. Renegotiate/continue?
Take your time, I'm ready whenever you are.
An unconventional strategy.
I don't like dealing with robots, but I'll do what I have to for the sake of Freeland.
If you are curious about our culture, just ask. Or do you send these spies because you need something?
We discovered your agent. You are a deceptive, untrustworthy fool. When will you learn?
You are sacrificing the lives of your people for shreds of information. Is it worth it?
Looks like you've lost some human capital.
We admire your persistence, but we're tired of your games.
We discovered a security leak and had to eliminate it. We will do so again, if necessary.
I understand you're afraid to face me in open war, but it will take more than espionage to defeat me.
Only cowards hide in the shadows. We'll continue killing your agents until you're ready to fight.
We caught an agent that wasn't up to your normally superior standards. We took care of it for you, no need to thank us.
Did you think you would beat us at our own game?
This is the best you can do? We expected more from you, waegukin.
Soon.
Kekeke waegukin, you are funny, trying to spy on us.
PAC agents are always so boring before they die.
We had an accident with one of your agents. We mistook him for you.
Assigning agents to us is not a good way for our organizations to leave the past behind.
How utterly plebian. I recommend looking into some sophistication, dear.
Well, I never…
You will never find enlightenment through subterfuge. And unfortunately, the agent we caught will never have the chance.
So, we caught one of your agents. This is a problem and we need to fix it. Stop spying on us, and let's talk like civilized people.
Ah numpty, you're mistaken if you think we'll be letting you spy on us. Try something else.
How dare you? You think you can just sabotage other colonies freely? Knowledge is not cheap, and now your agent has paid for it with his life.
A Chungsu agent in a PAC territory. That's not very original. You should try a different strategy, for once.
You're bringing new meaning to the term 'career suicide.'
We caught your agent. Do not spy on us anymore.
Don't be so greedy, saaxiib. There is plenty of land for all of us to share!
Yes, of course you try to take as much land as you can. We know what happens afterwards...
I am not surprised to see European imperialism survived the trek through the stars.
To have any land at all is a luxury. Are you so greedy you have to take it all for yourself?
Greed captures the essence of evolution. Kudos to you.
Your expansion is not following best practices. You should revise your roadmap.
Your expansion is beginning to be a problem. Don't force me to get involved.
You are encroaching upon our territory. We advise against this.
You didn't learn from the Incident, did you?
We see your foreign policy hasn't changed. If it doesn't, we will change it for you.
Avarice is completely charmless, I'm afraid. Why don't you look elsewhere.
Your expansion is a foolish plan. You should focus your efforts on other things.
Your shameless land grab is not going to solve anyone's problems. This type of irresponsible behavior is exactly why we're here.
Élodie, did it ever occur to you that traversing the galaxy proves you are not the center of the universe?
I'm guessing you wouldn't be satisfied with land or sea, but thinking you're wanting them both. No one needs that much land.
Your settlements are beginning to worry many of my counsellors. We expect you will stop settling so much land.
Territory? More like terrortory, am I right? On a serious note, let's ease off the imperialism, shall we?
You have enough land. Stop expanding. Use the land you have.
I like to think I'm reasonable. I can allow a lot of things, but never warmongering. Never.
Rejinaldo, have you never heard the proverb, "he who is destined for power does not have to fight for it?"
Violence is your answer to everything, isn't it? It won't solve all of your problems.
Your military is in direct violation of interstellar protocol. Cease and desist or suffer the consequences.
Keep this up and we're going to have to take you offline.
If you continue to threaten our assets, ARC will not hesitate to protect its investment here. Consider this your only warning.
Aggressive militaries make me angry. You wouldn't like me when I’m angry.
Leave the fighting to us, Prime Minister. You know what we're capable of.
ARC has no jurisdiction here, Chief Executive. You will play by the rules, or I will be forced to act.
Remember the Peshawar Crisis, Kavitha. I won't be so lenient with your people this time.
The Tigris Insurrection ended when I put an end to it. I will do likewise here if I must, Kavitha.
Operation Faustus was messy, Lena. Let's avoid another one.
Are you looking for a repeat of Route Blue? Because I will be happy to oblige.
General, I respect your command, but any threat to Brasilia will be met with a swift response.
Your military actions are disconcerting. We are monitoring the situation closely.
The empty cart rattles loudly.
You are reminding us of a certain, self-proclaimed imperial corsican. And we all remember what happened to him, don't we?
Why do you continue with intimidation tactics? Do you think your shows of aggression will change anything? You should keep to yourself.
You can't possibly claim that your use of military force is warranted. "Might" stopped making "Right" a long time ago.
Do you honestly believe you can scare us with all of your military's footerin? You'd have to plowt us better than that to make an impression.
Your military actions are reprehensible. I suggest you change your foreign policy to a more peaceful one.
We always knew you would show your true face. Now the world knows what we've always known.
Just keep those guns pointed away from us, and we'll get along fine.
Stop your military aggression. It does not intimidate us.
Your military actions are not scary. They make us laugh.
You are trying to intimidate us with your military. I must break you.
The People's African Union may be defeated, but the voice of our people will echo long after the sounds of war are gone.
We have seen things you sleepers couldn't imagine. It may be time to die, but the dream of Al Falah lives on.
You've made a terrible mistake. We could've been partners.
Russian dog. You'll never take me alive. Remember the Alamo!
Let me be remembered for what I accomplished on Earth, rather than for what you've destroyed here.
The dossier on you did not accurately reflect your resourcefulness. Well played, waegukin.
You think you have struck us down, but really, you have made us more powerful than you can possibly imagine.
Après moi, le déluge.
Et tu, Lena?
May the Lord of the Cosmos forgive you, and welcome you into oblivion. The Demon of Nihility persists, and we but atoms of ephemera.
It is our hope that a new generation of people will carry on our mission, despite your attempts to eradicate it. If you can't join us, at least learn from us.
You may have defeated us, but your philosophy is still fundamentally flawed. Europe is an old dream, and you're just old.
Quite a sotter we got ourselves into... and you deserve the recognition. Cheers to the victor.
You are a vicious, barbaric dictator, and you should be ashamed that you will be remembered as such.
We could've worked together. We should've put the past behind us. Instead, you chose this.
I knew this was a mistake. I should've trusted my instincts. To the victor go the spoils, I guess…
You defeated the Slavic Federation. That is not an easy thing to do. Good work.
Capitalist pig. My only request is to give back everything to the people.
You will learn the error of your beliefs, or you won't, but either way, I will remain steadfast in mine.
There is nothing greater in this world than harmony, friend. Join us.
Your foolish ways will be the death of your people.
I never thought our differences would be so vast.
I do not understand your ways. Why do you ignore the way of this world?
If this is how you exploited Earth, it's no wonder we were forced to leave.
How can you stray so far from your roots? Does history, or family mean nothing to you?
It's possible that we lost a piece of our humanity in space. But the strength we've gained was worth it.
Your strategic plan is not future-proof. Look around you, our way is the way of the future.
I've witnessed battlefied horrors you couldn't imagine coming from your flawed ideology.
I don’t trust these aliens, and neither should you. We have no idea what they're capable of.
What good is technology without humanity? Passion wins wars, not rationality.
These aliens wouldn't save you from plasma-pulse energy detonations. And that's exactly what we should do to all of them.
If you know the way, ask again. You'll find yourself alone.
Look at what you've become! Only a fool would do things the way you're doing them and expect a happy ending.
We cannot agree with the values you have chosen. If you continue in this path, we will be forced to defend our way of life.
You may be wonderfully talented in certain areas, but leave philosophical inquiry to us, won't you?
It is not because I am the Sage of the Protectorate that you should follow my way of life, but because yours is flawed.
Contemplate the error of your ways, as you worship the fabricated instead of the divine universe.
Walk not the path of artifice, but the righteous enlightenment of the universal divine.
You are as misguided as we are ascendant. We are blessed with power, and you with ignorance.
If you can't join us, at least learn from us. Homogeneity is not in-and-of-itself bad, and we should be able to understand each other at the very least.
You don't understand the implications of your ideology, do you? You should learn from the mistakes of others, like we have.
Remember, it takes all types to make a world.
What'll it profit you if you gain the world and lose your soul?
People are what's important, not these aliens. You can't love an alien, now can you?
You sure do like them buggers, don't you?
How can you trust AI, anyway? They're just going to turn on you one day. In fact, how do I know you're not an android yourself?
I prefer humans to cold titanium, personally.
There is no sanctuary, only us and these aliens.
If there's one thing I've learned, it's if you're going to make it, you need to adapt.
Just what do you think you're doing, Dav- I mean, Daoming.
Hokey Units and ancient ideals are no match for a good blaster at your side.
Your way is bad and wrong. Correct it, at once.
Everything is different here. You are wrong to think otherwise. Accept the new world.
I also enjoy technology, but I discovered something greater. Join me in the new world.
Aliens do not understand your humanity. You will regret losing your heritage.
Machines are just tools. Technology is an extension of humanity. You are forgetting this.
This planet is chaotic. The machine will guide it. We need the power of technology to control it.
You are obsolete. Join us. Resistance is futile.
Many fortunes to you and your family. I am Samatar Jama Barre of the People's African Union, but please, call me Kubwa Mjomba.
Lena, we were beginning to worry you wouldn't make it. How was the voyage?
I'm looking forward to a new era of peace between our people.
Greetings from the people of Al Falah. I am Arshia Kishk of the Golden Shah.
I am Arshia Kishk of Al Falah. We've travelled for centuries, through light years of space, and we are finally home.
Greetings, I'm Arshia Kishk of Al-Falah. My father told me stories about America. It's… interesting to meet you.
The American Reclamation Corporation is here to help.
I'm glad to see the PAC is well-represented. Nothing like healthy competition to spur innovation, right?
General Kozlov, how good of you to make it. Let's let bygones be bygones, shall we?
I am Rejinaldo Leonardo Pedro Bolivar de Alencar-Araripe, Supreme Commander of Brasilia. It's a pleasure to meet you.
Prime Minister, good to see you again. I hope we can work together.
Just as we expected. Greetings, waegukin. The pleasure is ours.
Secretary-Architect, things will be different here... for better or for worse.
Greetings, I am Élodie. I look forward to our time together on this brave new world.
Lena, what on Earth are you doing here? Don't you have refugees to champion? Endangered species to save?
As our third mother welcomes us, so too does my colony greet yours. We are, all of us, home at last.
On behalf of INTEGR, I greet you and wish your colony luck. And if we can learn to work together, neither of us will need it.
Hello, Élodie. Surprised to see me? You didn't think I'd let you ruin this planet, did you?
How do you do? I'm Duncan Hughes of the North Sea Alliance. It's good to see we're not alone.
Hello, I am the Secretary-Architect of the Pan-Asian Cooperative. I welcome you on behalf of our colony.
So the Chungsu comes out of hiding and decides to colonize this planet. We see what's going on, and we'll be watching you.
On behalf of the Commonwealth, I welcome you to Freeland.
Hello. I am General Kozlov Vadim Petrovich of the Slavic Federation.
The American Reclamation Corporation. I am not impressed.
Our approaches to living on this planet are simply too different. I'm afraid there will be serious consequences.
I will not tolerate your aggressive expansion!
Your military ambitions will not be tolerated!
My intelligence service has caught one of your covert agents. I cannot allow this to continue.
Your aggressive use of orbital infrastructure must stop immediately!
I simply cannot allow you to construct an orbital bridge from which to drop stones. Deorbit your satellites near us!
Your aggression in orbit is unwarranted and out of control. Cease orbital deployments near us immediately!
This covert action against us is unforgivable. Prepare for war!
It seems only war will stop your clandestine atrocities!
Make no mistake. You will never commit such an act of espionage again. I will make sure of it.
War is the only option. Prepare yourself.
I cannot tolerate your indiscretions any longer. Prepare for war!
You leave me with no recourse. War is the only option left.
We have cowered in fear long enough. We bend only so much before we break. Prepare for war!
You know what they say about villages and trade…
So, you think you can buy me off? This isn't Old Earth, and I am no fool.
I would be honored to make any deal with you.
I will listen to your offer.
You sleepers are all the same, wanting something for nothing.
My advisors tell me I should at least entertain your offer.
This world is a wonder of providence, but we understand if you still need other things.
You think I want anything to do with you?
Yes, let's trade. Our connections with each other are all we have.
I see you, friend. Let us reach a mutual agreement.
If you'll accept some of the humanity you've lost, we are happy to trade.
Did your machine overlords instruct you to bargain with me?
We are always open to trade.
It's either a value-add, or a hurdle. There's no in between.
There is nothing ARC can do to help you, but I'll listen to your offer.
You're in no position to bargain.
ARC is a full-service corporation. We've got what plants crave.
You better present a compelling case if you want us to consider any of your offers seriously.
ARC is happy to deal with its best customers.
ARC is an equal-opportUnity conglomerate. We will trade with you, despite your beliefs.
You have something for me?
What now? I am a soldier, not a negotiator.
I'm not interested in small talk. Let's get this over with.
Unless you're going to offer unconditional surrender, I don't want to hear it.
We are willing to negotiate, of course.
Of course I'm open to negotiations! I would never turn you away.
I'm not going to clean up PAC's mess again, if that's what you're here for.
Make your move.
Yes, we are open to trade. We have nothing to hide.
We know how your organization does business.
Shall we discuss a diplomatic agreement?
Yes, yes, let's get this over with. I have affairs to tend to.
How many times must we indulge this charade?
I do love a bit of politics.
As we trade words, let us also trade goods.
We are all entrusted by the wisdom of the mothers; universally, unequivocably and yet, unevenly. What is the false interpretation?
The Third Mother will guide us to wisdom in our agreement. Let us begin.
The isolation of space numbs you to the voice of the Third Mother, but you will hear it in our transaction.
The universal spirit cannot be extinguished by qubits of artifice; so, I will hear your offer.
We can no less bargain with you than regard ourselves in the mirror.
I would love to consider any offer you have for me.
Yes, I'm willing to talk, but let's get to the real issues at hand.
Oh, let's get this over with. I have no time for small talk.
Yes, I will barter with you. I promise I will be more patient than that time with your little aquatic art project.
Oh, yes, I'll give your proposals the benefit of the doubt, despite how that goes in your love life.
I will undoubtedly trade with you. If I can't deal with my own family, who can I deal with?
You know me: always willing to negotiate!
If you want to be discussing agreements with me, who am I to say no?
I'll discuss trade with you, aye. What are you interested in?
Ah numpty, bothering me about agreements again? You know what I’m going to say, don't you?
I'll gladly share some words with you. What kind of deal did you have in mind?
I'm sure we can reach an agreement. Let's not be hasty. I'm reasonable.
Discuss agreements? With me? Yes, absolutely.
I will negotiate trade agreements with you, provided they are reasonable.
It is highly unlikely you have anything worthwhile to offer us, but if you insist…
Yes, let's make arrangements to benefit both of our colonies.
We are ready for a mutually beneficial transaction, if you are, naturally.
So, you admit that the Chungsu needs something from the PAC? What a shame…
All right then, let's get down to it.
Look, we're not in this for your affinity, and we're not in it for you. I expect to be well compensated.
Talk to me.
Agreements, eh? What can I do you for?
What's on your mind?
Let's make a deal!
Who wants to make a deal? I know I do.
If I do not have time to discuss agreements with you, I will make time.
Make your proposal.
Yes, I will negotiate with you.
Yes, trade will help us. Thank you. We will return the favor, one day.
We will evaluate your proposal/tell us.
So dhowow.
Haye!
Always a pleasure.
Shikamoo, great leader. It is truly an honor to speak with you.
Thank you for joining us. You are our guest of honor, today.
We are honored by your very presence! Blessings to you.
Ah, hello neighbor. Do you... need something?
Is there a purpose to this visit? If not, I'm sorry but I am rather busy.
Oh, not you again… ah... yes? Can I help you?
I'm so glad you've chosen to follow our way of life. This planet will be a new peace amongst all people.
What could possibly bring you here?
How dare you show your face? Do you have no shame?
I don't know why I waste my time with you. What do you want?
Welcome, saaxiib. Let us share words. Tell me how you are doing, how is your colony?
It is always a pleasure to see a good neighbor. How can I help you today?
Blessings be upon you, friend. May you live a long and healthy life. Tell me, why have you come?
Welcome, saaxiib, welcome. You humble me with your visit.
Hello, my neighbor. Come in, come in, leave your troubles behind.
Please, let us be civil. How can we work towards peace?
Hello. I am here on behalf of my people. Let us talk, then.
Greetings, saaxiib, from my people to yours.
So dhowow, Ughaz.
It is good to see that you have not forgotten your ancestors, and neither have we.
The People's African Union welcomes you. Our families were once the closest of neighbors, and so I hope you will be too.
Hello, Suzanne. What business brings you to me today?
Ah, the American Reclamation Corporation is here, too. What a surprise…
Rejinaldo! How are you, my friend? Full of peace, I hope.
Ah, hello again, sweet Élodie.
Kavitha, it is a pleasure to see you, as always.
Peace upon you.
Yes?
What should we discuss?
So, have you come to destroy, or save us?
Is it a blessing, or a curse that you visit us?
I do not know what to say other than 'welcome.'
Why are you bothering me?
I do not have time for this, speak quickly.
What is it, sleeper?
You are not welcome.
What do you want?
I wish I never had to see you. Let's get this over with.
Hello, friend. Are you well?
It is good to see you. What brings you to Al Falah.
Good, I was hoping to speak to you.
Hello! Can I, or Al Falah, help you in any way?
I'm sorry we were not prepared for your arrival. Is there something I can do for you?
If there is anything I can do, please let me know.
Peace upon you.
Yes?
I am ready to talk if you are.
Hello again, Chief Executive. Is it true your infrastructure failed because of using precious metals in construction?
Hello again, Chief Executive. I'm curious, why wasn't your country a home for all of the braves?
Hello again, Chief Executive. So, who was this 'Uncle Sam,' and why was he so needy?
Hello again, Chief Executive. Why were your doctors also musicians? And why did they teach you smoke trees?
What can ARC do for you?
How can ARC help?
How are things?
ARC extends its best regards.
Welcome! Let me get you a seat.
We are pleasantly surprised by your visit. What can ARC do for you?
I'm a busy woman. Speak up.
Time is money. Let's get this over with.
I'm going to need you to speak up.
You have a lot of nerve coming here.
For your information, this conversation may be recorded and used against you.
I don't have time for this, and neither does ARC.
Welcome to the American Reclamation Corporation. How can we help you today?
Good, you made it. Let's talk.
So glad you could stop by.
ARC is here to meet your needs!
You're just the person I wanted to see. How can I help you today?
Thank you for stopping by, please let me know if there's anything wrong!
Greetings, from ARC.
Hello, and welcome to ARC.
ARC is always open for business.
Welcome. Shall we begin?
Honored.
Good day.
And the great leader visits us.
It is my honor to host you. Welcome.
We salute you, commander.
I don't have time for your nonsense. Make this quick.
Speak up. I don't have all day.
If you're going to talk, talk.
You disgust me.
What a disgrace…
I'd rather be talking to aliens.
Good to see you, friend.
You're always welcome.
Ah, what a nice surprise!
We are at your command.
You! You're... here to talk, no?
Hello, and… welcome, commander.
Brasilia salutes you.
You are here to discuss something, no?
Commander.
Can we be of service to you?
We were expecting you.
Nice of you to drop in.
We... were not expecting you.
Annyeong haseyo. We bow to you.
We are at your mercy.
Our time is precious.
We're waiting…
So…?
Hahaha, waegukin, come to beg?
So it's you. Do not doubt for a second that we know who our enemies are.
We know who you really are, waegukin.
It is good that you are here.
We do not forget our friends.
Ah, good. We were beginning to think you wouldn't come.
Can the Chungsu help you today?
You come in peace?
You're just here for friendly conversation, right?
We have much to discuss.
We know why you are here.
Let us begin.
This is your game, and we are merely players.
Welcome Madame Secretary-Architect. We know why you are here…
Buongiorno!
Bonjour!
Buenas…
My, my, to what do I owe this honor?
I appreciate you coming to speak with me.
What a privilege to see you!
How do you do?
Surely I have something better to do?
I'm not one for idle chit-chat, dear.
Can't you go and pester someone else?
I was expecting someone important…
I don’t usually suffer fools gladly, but for you, I guess I can make an exception.
Are you trying to try my patience?
Oh spare me the empty pleasantries.
What a pleasant surprise.
So good of you to make a visit.
How are you, dear? Everything fine with your colony?
Charmed, I'm sure.
Let's remain civil, yes?
You've come to see little old me?
You wouldn't hurt a poor old lady, would you?
Oh, hello darling.
Bonjour, hello.
Yes, greetings and salutations and all that.
How fares our lovely cousin Lena?
Greetings.
Namaste.
Hello, and peace be with you.
Hello and welcome.
You are here as the Lord of the Cosmos, and we but infinitesimal dust.
Does the Universal Divinity stand before me?
You are as the Prophet, reborn.
Perhaps you should seek council within yourself, first.
Yes, I will speak with you. It is my burden to speak with the unfortunate.
Yes, what is it? We are infinite and eternal, but my patience is not.
We see you, we are here. We commune.
The Lord of the Cosmos moves through us. We worship him in our communion.
Our brethren… welcome home.
The supraconscious is here. Hello, recorder-of-the-past.
We greet you, Spirit of Artifice. We will listen to the words of the entropic demon.
The spirit of nihility comes to destroy the third mother in its nothingness. We wonder what it wants…
The Samadhi is one. Hello, recorder-of-the-future.
The Kavithan Protectorate will not turn you away, despite who you are.
The Demon of Nihility lives within you, and I will purge it.
Your kind does not deserve my wisdom, but I am not the judge.
You are not welcome in the Protectorate. What do you want?
As the third mother embraces us, so do we welcome you.
Kindness is a way of life. We bid you welcome with it.
Peace and prosperity to our brothers and sisters.
Greetings to you, my friend. It is good to share in your existence.
The Protectorate is here for you.
We strive only to serve the needs of the spiritual.
I am merely a servant of the cosmos.
Namaste. We are here.
Greetings from the Kavithan Protectorate.
The Protectorate welcomes you.
Although I am sad to see you have lost your way, I am happy to see you.
You have forsaken the universal divinity to worship the artificial. Why, then, are you here?
Despite your ways, I will always welcome my spiritual siblings.
Welcome, purist. We greet you as we greet a forgotten dream; nostalgic in your ignorance, hopeful in your futility.
Blessings upon you, purist. Without your dedication to the memory of the old Mothers, we would be doomed to repeat mistakes.
Hello again, purist. The legacy of humanity is strong and terrible to behold in you. How can we serve you?
Geht es Ihnen gut?
Ahoj.
Witam.
I’m truly thankful for your time.
This is a rare honor.
We're glad you've deigned to speak with us.
I'm not going to just sit around waiting for you.
I hope this is important, for your sake.
I assume this is urgent.
You will pay, eventually.
Your behavior is reprehensible.
What makes you think I want to talk with you?
Well, this is a nice relief from the tedium.
I'm happy you stopped by.
Welcome, welcome. I wish I had more visitors like you.
Welcome to our humble home. How can we be of service?
I'm surprised you took the time to visit us.
Let's work together.
Hello, how can I help you?
How are you today?
Let's talk progress. I'm never too busy to talk progress.
Hello Elodie. To what do I owe this pleasant surprise?
Ah, bonjour madame. I hope you're here to trade more than passive aggressive witticisms.
Ah, if it isn't the custodian of the beautiful. What do you want from me today?
Oh, Elodie, now I understand. You see, I felt a headache beginning this morning, but it turns out it was just you.
Hello cousin. It is good to see you're doing well, as always.
Elodie, it's good to see you. I hope the feeling is mutual?
Hello there.
Well hello!
Aye?
Well, what an unprecedented visit.
You have our undivided attention, captain.
'Tis an honor.
For God's sake, what do you want.
I'm about through with your blithering.
Ach, for crying out loud.
You're a brave soul to speak with me.
I've got nothing to say to the likes of you.
You must be daft, coming here.
Ah, good to see you.
How are you this fine day?
How's it with you?
Ah, I'm not looking for any trouble.
Whatever you need, just let me know.
The NSA can help. What's your pleasure?
The North Sea Alliance welcomes you.
Good day to you.
Aye?
After all you did-- and now here-- you are stupid to think the PAC will have anything to do with your organization.
Ni Hao.
Greetings to you.
How do you do?
I feel lucky simply to speak with you.
Your leadership is an example for us all.
We have much to learn from you.
Are you lost, or do you actually want to speak with me?
How much time will this take?
I can't speak for very long.
You have no leverage here.
You are annoying.
You must be joking.
Our doors are always open for a friend.
Hello, how are you? Have you eaten, yet?
Welcome. I'm looking forward to a nice conversation.
You are, of course, welcome here.
Are you sure you want to speak with us?
We're just a colony, like you.
Hello, welcome. How are you?
Greetings from our colony to yours.
The Pan-Asian Cooperative welcomes you.
G'day!
How are you?
Good to see you.
I didn't think you'd have time for me.
Well, I'm impressed!
Count my lucky stars... what brings you here?
The clock's ticking, and I'm not getting any younger.
I don't know if I, or anyone for that matter, can help you.
All right, you have my attention.
I don't know that I would help you even if I wanted to.
I hope you're not here for charity.
Look, don't you have someone else to bother?
If it isn't my favorite colony leader. How are you?
Hello there beautiful, great to see you.
I'm here for you.
Can I offer you a cup of soma, or some adrenahol perhaps?
Good to see you, good to see you. Can I offer you a cup of soma? Or maybe some adrenahol?
Don't mind me. I'm harmless.
Let's not do anything rash.
G'day, mate.
I'm ready when you are.
Come to see old Hutama, have you?
Unlike some people, I am not a number, I am from Freeland.
Hello.
Hello.
Hi.
What is it?
At least you know what you're doing.
Good job. Keep it up.
Not bad. I approve.
What now?
You, again? Why?
Well?
We will crush you.
Your point?
Pathetic.
Hello, comrade.
Can I help you?
The Slavic Federation greets you.
Welcome.
Hello.
Welcome.
To be honest, I need time to consider. I cannot give you an answer now.
I will consider this, but only out of pity.
I might do you the favor of accepting after I think it over, but probably not.
That is an interesting proposal my good neighbor... I will consider it.
Let me consult my advisors about this offer.
We'll have to take a deep dive on your proposal. Let's let that marinate for a while.
I need to vet this proposal. Give me some time to consider it.
Unprecedented. We will meditate on this.
Let me think about it.
How extraordinary. I'll have to mull this over.
I'll have to think this over, dear. In the mean-time why don’t we do something about your hair.
That is an interesting offer. We will consider it, and take your thoughts along with ours.
I want to make sure to give this proposal the full attention it deserves… give me some time to examine it and I will let you know my answer.
That's an interesting proposal. Let me think it over a while.
That is a truly intriguing offer. Give me some time to study it and I will get back to you.
Let's not rush into anything. I like to take things slowly.
I do not know. I will think about this.
We must refrain from dealing with you right now.
Do you really think I would make agreements with you right now?
We're going to hold off from making agreements with you.
I have more important things to worry about than politicking with you right now.
Do you expect us to talk?
I'm not making agreements with you right now.
I won't bore you with platitudes, we're simply not dealing with you.
I'm afraid I have no time for you, dear cousin.
I can understand many things, but I cannot see a way to find an agreement with you.
Don't waste our time. We're not making agreements with you. Go to someone else.
Oh, you think I'll be making agreements with you? You're wrong.
You've got to be completely mad to think I'll entertain offers from the likes of you.
We are not making deals with your colony. Nothing personal, just business
Even if I wanted to, there is no chance we can reach an agreement. As in zero percent.
Sorry, mate. Can't do that for you right now.
No. No deal. Not now. Maybe in the future.
I accept these terms, and hope this peace is a lasting one.
I'm pleased that we can put this all behind us.
Please, let us make peace.
My people are tired of fighting. Let's put aside our differences.
I will not surrender to you!
You must be joking.
And so we fight on. How long will our peoples suffer because of your stubbornness?
I will not consider peace while the conflict is barely begun.
My troops have not yet begun to fight. I will not allow this to end before they have shown what they can do.
Neither side has the upper hand. I will not quit the war before a clear victor emerges.
A white peace is not enough. This war will continue until one of us wins or loses.
Our cause is not lost yet. I will not surrender so quickly.
You may be winning, but this war is far from over. There will be no peace yet.
I'm sorry if we've offended you, but if this is how you wish to live, so be it.
Are all of you sleepers so easily upset?
I guess that just wasn't in the cards.
I agree, we were... too close.
Are you trying to provoke me?
How predictable.
It troubles me to see our relationship degrade.
Oh, please. Your posturing is just tawdry.
I'm not surprised. You were always so petty in your jealousy.
It is a shame that it comes to this.
I understand the desire to keep a certain distance in diplomatic ties. Sometimes an agogic disruption is a positive thing.
Well, that's a surprise. Was it something I said?
That was unnecessary. Have you considered the possibility that you are overly cautious and paranoid regarding diplomatic relationships?
Getting cold feet, are you?
Sometimes we have to go backwards to go forwards, right?
What is wrong? Are you mad?
Negative input/status updated. We do not support your decision.
I think this is wise. Cooperation between neighbors can overcome any problem.
I accept. A move towards peace is a move towards prosperity.
Now we're gaining traction.
All right. We'll play ball.
Closer to allies is better than the alternative, no?
We like to keep our friends close…
I am pleased by this improvement.
I accept your proposal. Civilized people ought to stick together.
Like Moliere, I want to be distinguished from the rest.
I support your efforts towards friendship. We accept one another to be whole.
Closer cooperation between our colonies can only result in a positive feedback cycle. I'm looking forward to future collaboration.
Good, that's settled then. Let's get on with improving our situations.
This is a good development. We both benefit from decreased tensions.
Now we're getting somewhere.
Let me guess: you like me because I'm a scoundrel. There aren't enough scoundrels in your life?
Good. We will work together.
Improved relations/diplomatic success. Thank you for your cooperation.
I'm sorry it's come to this. Conflict is never the answer.
You shouldn't be so careless. You're playing with fire.
We're very sorry you feel this way. We hope you've thought this through.
If that's the way you want to proceed, Brasilia is prepared.
You're sure about this? We could crush you, you know.
Did I do something to offend you?
Careful… this is a dangerous game you play. Either you win, or you die.
We knew it was only a matter of time before you revealed your true colors.
This is only repeating the mistakes of the past!
I cannot believe things have come to this.
That was uncalled for.
How droll. How trite How banal. How... Lena.
I hope that was out of reason rather than emotion. One will lead to enlightenment; the other nothingness.
I hope this is just a playful experimentation with diplomacy rather than a permanent decision. Playfulness is good, permanence is an illusion.
I can't believe you actually went through with that. Did no one tell you it was a bad idea?
Oh, that was a mistake, numpty. You're going to be paying for that kind of behavior.
That seems arbitrary and overreactive. What precipitated this?
That's a bit much, don't you think?
Hah! So you do not want to be friends? Good.
Degraded relationship/reevaluate position. If you are not compliant, you are incorrect.
Not a chance.
This disappoints me.
I'm pleased you accept.
Wonderful, saaxib. Together we are building a better community.
Good. Together we'll walk this path towards peace.
I'm glad we can look beyond our differences.
My prayers have been answered, thank you, thank you.
I'm glad we can find some common ground despite our differences.
Glad we're on the same page.
I'm honored you'll allow us to benefit from your friendship.
Excellent. This is much better than fighting each other, no?
Your wisdom will serve your colony well.
We look forward to future engagements.
How wonderfully capital. I do enjoy collaboration.
Diplomacy agrees with you, cousin. Much more than that garish thing on your nose.
That was a wise decision. As we work together, so do our spirits Unite.
I'm happy we can work together so productively. The inherent value of cooperation is only compounded by our working together.
I'm relieved to find that, much like you in your youth, that was remarkably easy!
I was beginning to think you'd back out of that one. I'm glad you proved me wrong.
Good, let's collaborate to construct a brighter future for both of us.
If this ain't cause for celebration, I don't know what is.
Excellent. You will see the benefit of this.
Your endorsement is good. We will proceed.
I hope there's no problem with our current relationship?
Yes, we should reconsider our diplomatic relations. For your sake.
I am fine with where we stand, but I will listen to your suggestion.
So you'd like to revisit our standing?
What are our next steps?
So you want to shake things up, do you?
So you want to ammend our little situation here?
You're not going to persuade us to join your cause. The 'A' in ARC stands for American, not Alien.
You want to discuss our relationship?
I agree, it's time for a change.
We are privileged to be players in this game of yours…
We would both benefit from closer cooperation.
As unlikely as it seems, we hope our organizations can find a way to cooperate.
Shall we discuss our diplomatic relationship?
I assure you, I'm aquiver in anticipation.
Oh, this should be good. Is there a problem with our relationship?
I'll listen to what you have to say, for the sake of our parents if nothing else.
So you wish to discuss our political relationship? Remember what is fleeting, and what is eternal.
Diplomatic relationships are arguably more important the the agreements we make, so it goes without saying I'm happy to discuss our status.
I was wrong about you, and you're proving it more and more. I'll follow your lead in our relationship, as well.
You are so insecure. Our diplomatic ties are fine, but if you absolutely must broach the subject, go ahead.
I hope this discussion will be in the form of an apology that you owe me and all of the people of INTEGR.
I will always make time for you, dear. You know that. What's on your mind?
I hope I didn't offend you in any way. I mean, you seem a bit direct wanting to discuss our diplomatic status…
I'm honored to have diplomatic ties with your colony, and I'd be honored to improve them, as well.
Aye, I'll discuss our political relationship. What's on your mind?
If you want to be bumbling about with our diplomacy, I'll only put up with it for so long.
Don't tell me you're going to try and make things better. I wouldn't believe a word of it.
Well, if you want to discuss our relationship, I'm all ears.
Ah, I hope you want to improve our relationship. I'm not one to get on your bad side.
We are happy to review our diplomatic standing with you. In fact, it is an honor to have any ties to you at all.
You'd like to change our diplomatic relationship?
If this is about our agreements or lack thereof, I'm afraid this will have to wait.
Your colony is pathetic. What makes you think we want anything to do with you?
Diplomatic relationships are hard to quantify, but there is intrinsic value in maintaining strong ties. So, we're happy to discuss ours.
Is there something wrong? Are we at odds about something?
I'm always up for making relations.
I eagerly anticipate our closeness.
Yes? I am listening…
Relationship proposal evaluation initiated. What do you propose?
Don't you agree, that we should mend our relationship?
I would like to fix our standing with you.
ARC would like to propose a new understanding.
Let's work towards an alliance. Even I can get tired of war.
Let's talk about our current relations, no?
We have an exclusive arrangement we would like you to see.
We'd like to extend to you this offer.
I would like to change our diplomatic relationship to {1_RelationshipStatusName}.
Our cultures could benefit from each other. How does this look to you?
Lena, let's not argue. It doesn't become us.
We are destined to interact. We are woven together by the cosmic continuum, let us reflect this in friendship.
I'd like to propose a closer relationship between our colonies. I'm sure you'll see the benefits far outweigh the detriments.
What do you think about improving our status with each other?
We are prepared to progress with our diplomatic relationship, if you are.
Whether times are good or bad, let's stay together.
Let's get to know each other better, shall we?
Let's not beat around the bush…
We should work together. Here is my offer:
Commence diplomatic relationship evaluation. What do you think of this?
It is a tempting offer, but perhaps another time would be best.
I will not commit Al Falah to that deal.
That won't work for us. Let's take this discussion offline.
That is too much, too soon.
This deal is satisfactory. We would like to see it improved.
Don't try to cover the sky with the palm of your hand, waegukin.
We are not part of your system. We are above your system.
Sorry, but that would be a Great Mistake…
I don't think this change to our diplomatic relationship is appropriate at this time.
We are not ready to improve our relationship, sorry dear.
I am beginning to tire of your preposterous fancies.
We cannot exist where we do not exist. And as such, we cannot agree to that relationship.
I'm sorry, but we'd like to be more conservative with our diplomatic approach.
I can't commit to that now, but I thank you for the gesture.
I was prepared for your offer, and unfortunately my answer is not yes.
I hate to turn you down, but it has to be this way.
No. Maybe another day, but not today.
This is a missed opportUnity.
You are a savvy negotiator, but you will come around eventually.
Was my offer really so terrible? Remember, negativity is infectious...
A mistake. Hopefully you learn from it.
I guess our pitch didn't resonate with you?
If we can't be allies, we are destined to be enemies.
Others might see a rejection. We see a challenge
How unexpected. Perhaps we were wrong about you.
That was merely a test. We knew that proposal was flawed.
Even here, common sense is not so common.
Methinks she doth protest too much.
All things return. You may not desire a closer relationship with our colony now, but you will.
While I'm sorry to hear that you don’t want to improve our diplomatic relations, I can appreciate our differences as well.
What? Are you telling me that didn't look like a great deal to you?
You don't think we both stand to gain from working closer together? You are mistaken, but it will have to do for now.
That's certainly putting the 'rude' in prudence, don't you think?
That is not what we expected. Reconsider and then contact me.
Failed estimate/we will create a new proposal for you.
I am still thinking on our relationship. These things take time, I’m afraid.
My advisors are debating the merits of your offer. They are very thorough.
We still need to spend more cycles on your proposal. Let's circle back on this one.
I'm still looking over your proposal. I need more time.
I'm a soldier, not a diplomat. I need time to think about this.
We haven't decided yet. We are… preoccupied.
I'm still thinking about your proposal.
Be a good sport and let me think this over.
You are always rushing me. The world isn't going to fall apart this second. Give me a moment.
I cannot give you an answer yet. The vastness of the cosmos exists in the contemplation of every decision.
I'm still weighing the offer and, to be honest, I need more time to think it over.
I'm still considering your proposal. Why don’t we talk about something else?
I am still analyzing your offer. It has many advantages and disadvantages, so there is a lot to consider.
Just hold on a little longer. I'll have something for you soon.
It is too soon. We are still discussing your proposal.
Forgive an old man's memory, but I can't keep track of so many agreements. Cancel some and we can negotiate.
You are probably using so many agreements to mask your intentions. I've learned to not trust someone who is so entangled.
We can't negotiate terms when you have so many agreements.
You have too many balls in the air. Cancel some agreements and we'll talk.
You are comprimised by your agreements. We can negotiate when you don't have as many.
We are concerned your many obligations present a conflict of interests.
You have too many agreements. Cancel a few, and I'll consider an arrangement.
Oh, we wouldn’t want to burden you with too many agreements now, would we?
You never could learn to relax. That was always your problem. Look at how many agreements you have. It's absurd.
Trade is a good thing, but it is possible to have too much of it. When you have less, we can consider an agreement.
Unfortunately, you have too many commitments. We'll wait until you're ready to give our agreements your full attention.
You have too many agreements and I can't be trading with you like that. Get rid of some.
I understand you are committed to a number of agreements already. We will wait until your commitments aren't such a burden.
Looks like you can't fit us into your busy schedule with all of those 'agreements' of yours.
You have too many agreements. I can't work with you like this.
Yes, of course I accept peace!
You should know better than to fight your neighbors.
I will spare you, but only because I'm sick of dealing with you.
Of course we accept. I never wanted war in the first place.
I am always in favor of peace, especially with you.
I don't know what we were thinking, warring with you.
Good. Al Falah has better things to do than war with sleepers.
We should put you out of your misery, but we will leave that to someone else.
Hopefully, the resolution to this conflict will only bring us closer together.
I have never fought such an opponent, and I hope I never have to again.
Of course we accept peace with you. ARC is ambitious, not stupid.
We accept, but only because this war is an expense we're not willing to take on.
Why destroy something when you can own it instead?
It's a pleasure doing business with you, especially when the business is peace.
ARC knows what's best for our partners is best for us.
I'm a soldier. I know when a fight is over.
My heart isn't in this fight.
Yes, because there's truth in keeping enemies closer.
It was fun while it lasted, but I’m ready for peace.
You definitely earned this peace, amigo.
Yes. In fact, we can only accept peace from greatness.
Very well, waegukin. We will spare you.
We can accept this. The Chungsu is nothing if not patient.
Yes, waegukin, we can accept your offer.
We were just testing your defenses, of course.
I admire your wisdom, in war and peace.
Yes, I have much better things to do, like watching floatstone grow.
I suppose we can have mercy on the unfortunate.
You know I never wanted to fight you in the first place, of course.
Marvelous!
The Lord of the Cosmos be praised, we accept.
Mercy is your destiny.
Even the miasma precipitates breath.
Blessings upon you, and upon our peace.
The Universal Divine moves through your offer.
This was an agogic disruption, for the better.
Hopefully, you'll take away something valuable from this.
We accept for the sake of the environment, if nothing else.
We gladly accept peace.
This will help us understand each other better.
I'd be crazy to reject peace with you.
All right, numpty. Peace it is.
All right, but only because this isn't much of a challenge.
Aye, we'll make peace with you.
I'm not dying for anyone.
The PAC gladly agrees to peace.
Yes, peace is preferable and not a distraction.
I would prefer to outthink you.
To be honest, the PAC never wanted to war with you in the first place.
Given the likelihood of defeat, of course we accept.
You beaut, I thought you'd never ask.
On behalf of Polystralia and Freeland, I accept your offer of peace.
All right, I'll let you have peace this one time.
All right, mate. You've got yourself a deal.
Let's just pretend this never happened.
You are generous. I accept, of course.
Any peace is better than this war.
This is acceptable to us. Unlike you.
A generous offer. We accept.
I have no choice. I accept.
I gladly accept this offer of peace on behalf of the People's Union.
It will be peace for both of us, then.
All right, we'll play ball.
This is a good time for a truce. I accept.
Yes, this peace is according to plan.
Yes, this war isn't doing either of us any favors.
May the blessings of the Universal Divinity enlighten our future as we accept this peace.
Yes, we have more important things to do than fight each other.
Aye, let's save the hostilities for those who deserve it.
This benefits the Pan-Asian Cooperative. We accept.
Right. That war wasn't getting us anywhere.
We also want peace.
Please, be merciful, for the lives of our people, if not for ourselves.
I don't know why we must fight, but I want it to end.
This generosity is more than you deserve.
War is an abomination. Let's agree to peace.
Please, let us put aside warfare and accept peace.
We can't hope to defeat you. It was foolish of us to even try.
We are all tired of this pointless war. Let's end it, now.
Al Falah is merciful, despite what you deserve.
The time has come to put aside our differences. Let us be friends instead of enemies.
My worthy advesary. Are you ready to end this senseless war?
I'm laying it all on the table. We're no match for you.
This war isn't profitable for either of us.
ARC is committed to not wasting time.
Let's get back to business.
Let's not ruin a good thing over small details.
It has been an honor, but I am ready for peace.
This war is not much of a war at all.
We are dishonoring real war with this farce.
I know when a war is finished. That time is now.
Are you ready to end this?
We do not surrender, but we know our better when we see one.
This game bores us. Let's end it.
Don't mistake this carefully assembled offer for pity.
Let's put aside these petty games, shall we?
Our information was wrong.
We don't have to put aside our differences, just the military.
Let's drop this paltry charade and get on with civility, shall we?
Let's make this little footnote in the annals of colonial history disappear, shall we?
Make love, not war?
Anything less than peace would be... uncivilized.
Please, end the suffering of an entire planet.
Your salvation is at hand, should you accept it.
Your colony may survive the torrent.
Let us be as the children of the third mother, in peace.
The universe cries for peace.
Complex situations require complex solutions.
Peace is the first step in communal learning.
We're offering you a chance to grow from this experience.
Peace is requisite for collaboration.
Let's reflect on the source of the conflict, rather than continuing it.
Can we put this behind us?
That's enough of that. What do you say?
I'm done fighting with the likes of you.
Let's stop all of this warmongering, all right?
It's better to run and live, right?
What do you think about this peace proposal?
We'll consider peace with you.
I think we've proven our point. Are you ready to surrender?
I have no interest in continuing this war, do you?
In the interest of efficiency, let's end this war.
There are better things you could be doing, don't you agree?
Fun's fun but let's call it a day.
I don't want anything to do with you, especially war.
Let's take it easy on all the shooting, eh?
You and I both know this isn't going anywhere.
Come, let us build a peace.
Let's fight another day.
The Slavic Federation offers you peace. Accept it.
Truce?
This war is interrupting productivity.
Let us learn from this conflict and move on. Let us accept embrace peace.
We would like to extend this offer of peace to you.
We here at ARC are no longer interested in continuing this war.
It seems we are at a stalemate. Shall we call a truce?
We propose a peace between our colonies.
Let's put this nasty business behind us, shall we?
Violence is an abomination to the Lord of the Cosmos. Let us end it.
We need to work together to truly achieve anything meaningful.
I've seen what a little turmoil can do to a fragile civilization, and I want no part of that here.
This conflict seriously threatens our survival here.
This war has gone on long enough, don't you think?
We want peace. What is your answer?
This is the beginning of a new era. Let's hope we never war again.
I'm glad you've learned your lesson.
And next time I will not be so generous.
Today is a great day, saaxiib.
You are benevolent as you are wise.
The nightmare is over. After Planetfall, this is the greatest day in Al Falah's existence.
I'm glad you know what's best for your colony.
Of course you will accept peace, in your condition.
For ushering in peace, I will be the first to name you a friend of Al Falah.
I thought you would never accept peace. We are fortunate.
I'm glad you know when to fold them.
I'll let my secretary handle the details.
As much fun as that was, we need to get back to business.
Pleasure doing business with you.
You certainly know a good deal when you see it.
I'm glad I lived long enough to see this peace.
I'm happy you're wise enough to agree with me.
I didn't think you knew what "honor" meant.
I'm glad you agree, comrade.
That's more like it.
The Chungsu does not forget a favor.
Good, now we can get back to important matters.
Of course you would.
Good. Now for more something more serious.
Excellent, let's put this behind us.
I'm relieved, for the sake of the canon if nothing else.
Oh, good. You accepted.
Hooray, wonderful, etc.
Happy to put aside all that barbaric bloodshed.
Let's celebrate this peace and hope it never happens again, shall we?
Now, we may rest.
There is hope for you and your people.
And it will live to see a new age of peace.
Together, in peace, we will sprout the trees of humanity.
And now it sings the praises of your wisdom.
Your ability to understand different viewpoints is greatly appreciated.
This is what progress looks like.
INTEGR espouses the values inherent in agogic disruptions.
Good. I'm sure we both learned from this.
Thank you for giving us the chance to grow from this.
Ah, that's a relief. Here's to peace!
Good to hear it, numpty.
And I'm glad I don't have to deal with you anymore.
Thanks. I never did enjoy fighting you.
I'm glad you see it my way.
I'm happy to put this behind me.
You've earned yourself a small measure of respite.
Do not cross us again.
Good, let's get back to managing our colonies, then.
We're happy you see it our way.
A momentous occasion. This calls for celebration.
Your colony's lucky you're smart enough to accept peace.
Good, I hope the feeling's mutual.
Now, we celebrate.
Well I'll be a Manticore's uncle.
Peace is the foundation greatness.
Good for you and me. But mostly you.
Good.
Now we can build instead of destroy.
Excellent! Back to work.
I look forward to our renewed peace.
It's good you accepted. Why fight when we can work together?
We would like to extend our congratulations to our new peace.
Then it's settled. Time for R&R.
This was a good decision. We are pleased.
Moltes gràcies
Seedlings can only grow in the peaceful womb of the Third Mother.
Now we can get to the important work.
Good, now that that's over and done with, I have work to do.
I am glad that this conflict is over.
I'm glad you agree.
This is good. Now we can work together.
If you do not want peace, what do you want?
You will have to learn from your mistakes.
You will get what you do deserve, then.
We should be allies, not enemies.
I was a fool to hope you would choose peace.
Our nightmare continues. We will find peace, somehow.
You sleepers must need the excitement after doing nothing for so long.
I'm sad you condemn your people to certain death.
I don't understand why you wish to continue this, but I respect your right to choose.
I'm not surprised. Al Falah is doomed.
Well, that is definitely going in the minus column.
For your sake, I hope you're bluffing.
ARC will help you learn from failing fast, early, often, and hard.
So, you're going to play hardball?
If I were you, I'd also hold out for a better offer.
Sometimes you eat the Wolf Beetle, sometimes it eats you.
Don't say I didn't offer you a way out of this.
You don't know the meaning of honor, do you?
So there's some fight left.
Sometimes we have to fight.
Just as we expected…
Well, at least make it interesting, then.
We will enjoy watching your destruction.
Intriguing, if not misguided.
So, you wish to annihilate us?
Of course, why would anyone want to preserve thousands of years of beauty?
Insisting on nonsense, are we?
Good. I was looking forward to erasing you from history.
And I thought we were friends…
Don't make me beg, I'm bad at it.
Then the struggle of nihility ensues…
There is no hope for you, or your people.
Or it will sink into the void.
We must be siblings in cooperation, if not in the spirit.
It falls on the deaf ears of the void.
Power dynamics will always play a part in negotiations, unfortunately.
You have to be more playful in your approach to politics.
You'll regret not taking the chance to grow.
Then I will just have to try and understand your viewpoint.
We'll have to try a different strategy, then.
Great. Now what?
So it's more of this war, then? Have it your way.
You're brave. I'll give you that.
Ah, let's not keep doing this.
Oh for the sake of…
This is not the optimal solution.
This is only deprecating a bad situation.
We have no qualms in continuing, then.
You do? Why?
Are you sure about this? Why not reconsider?
Didn't expect I'd be so lucky, or that you'd stoop so low.
What do I have to do to get a little peace around here?
I guess it's back to lobbing titanium-laced projectiles at each other, then.
You're not going to take things lying down are you?
I understand. If I were you I'd say the same thing.
Fine. Then we will fight and die.
Bad for you and me. But mostly bad for you.
Then we have no more time for you.
So frustrating…
We will fight to the end.
A shame. Perhaps we will reach peace another time.
Is this how you did things on Old Earth?
Not your best decision, but we'll play this out.
I guess we're done talking, then.
Are you sure you want to continue this?
C'est la vie…
Peace is something to be desired, not discarded.
This is getting in the way of progress.
You'll just have to see for yourself, then.
You're making a mistake. This war will is not a good policy for either of us.
Guess not.
Then we are done speaking.
It may be in vain, but I will always defend my people.
I'm afraid I have to teach you a lesson, saaxiib.
The world is better off without you.
I'm sorry, but this war is for your own good.
People like you are too powerful to trust.
We can't accept, there is something wrong. Why would you want peace with us?
Why would we accept peace when victory is assured?
No, we won't accept your peace, and we will not stop until you have been completely destroyed.
We are not ready for peace. We both must change our ways.
Against all odds, we stand against you. It is better to die free than live in oppression.
Sorry, but the first thing I learned was when to hold them.
Sorry, but ARC doesn't negotiate with future assets.
You're not part of our roadmap.
Nothing personal, this war is just business.
Sorry, but we're going to have to flex our muscles here.
It's an honor to fight you. Why would I stop?
I'm a soldier, not a pacifist.
I'm a soldier, not a charity.
Sorry, but I'm enjoying this too much to stop now.
You think I'm a pushover, no?
We are aware of your plans for after this so-called "peace."
No, you will not get off the hook so easily.
Your time has run out.
Unfortunately, that is not in our best interests.
We know your agenda, and we will not capitulate.
I can't trust someone I can't understand.
Not today, I'm afraid…
Oh dear, what made you think I was merciful?
I'm afraid I'm simply having too much fun!
Not what I was hoping for, but I understand.
Even the Demon of Entropy must be appeased, sometimes.
We do not deal with the empty-souled.
As the storm washes away detritus, so will you meet your fate.
The demon of illusion is this false peace.
We cannot condemn our people to spiritual slavery.
No. A truce now would forfeit the strides we've made.
We cannot build a global commUnity with you.
The long term benefit of continuing this conflict outweighs the immediate convenience of peace.
Sometimes conflict is the only way to exchange ideas.
I don't want your pity. That's just contempt.
I might be crazy, but we've got to stop you before it's too late.
Oh, you're not going to get out of this so easy.
No, no. You're going to get what you deserve.
I'm afraid I just can't do that.
I know better than to trust the likes of you.
Peace would only shift the power balance further in your favor.
There's no reason for us to agree to peace right now.
Peace is a practical impossibility at this point.
We insist on the right to defend ourselves.
You will be unstoppable if not opposed here and now.
Sorry gorgeous, but some things are too good to be true.
Now why would I go and do that?
You've got to be joking.
I'm willing to work with you, but not like that.
I need to sweeten the deal, do I?
You are too strong. You must be stopped.
Do you think I like doing this?
The Slavic Federation is not intimidated.
What doesn't vaporize you makes you stronger.
Peace is an illusion. War is truth.
In the bests interests of the Union, I unfortunately cannot accept this offer of peace.
No, we will not make peace with you.
No deal. We can't accept your peace offer.
It's not the time for peace, yet. The war must go on.
At this time, peace does not suit us.
That's not a very compelling offer, I’m afraid.
We cannot accept peace while this conflict is justified.
Peace is not an option in this situation.
Oh no, you're not going to get off that easy.
You will have to make a stronger case if you want us to accept peace.
Sorry, but Freeland has to defend itself.
No, no peace. Not now.
This war was over before it began.
When will you learn?
I'm only here out of respect for our shared past.
It is a shame to continue this war between neighbors.
You will destroy us, sooner or later.
We will fight until the end.
I didn't expect you to be surrendering so soon. That is why you're here, right?
Come to beg forgiveness?
I'm happy you're here. It's good to talk with you, instead of all of the fighting.
Are you here to laugh at us?
So, you want to talk mergers and acquisitions?
I cancelled my 9 o'clock, this better be good.
All right, let's talk numbers.
We don't usually talk to competitors, but for you, we'll make an exception.
If it isn't ARC's biggest competitor. Here to buy us out?
I'm lucky to finally face a worthy opponent.
Brasilia is not a nation to be trifled with.
We should be fighting, not talking.
Today is a good day to fight, or make peace.
I'm sorry this is not much of a contest.
So, you expect us to talk?
Like a fly into a spider's nest…
You are sadly mistaken if you think you can beg.
Quite a game we're having, isn't it?
Just so you know, this conversation is being recorded.
Dare I hope that we can end this war?
All this barbarism is completely beyond me.
It's a bit trite, isn't it? The war I mean, not you…
I do believe I'll never understand the nature of warfare.
I'm remembering an Old Earth song about the uselessness of war.
There is only one victor when the void meets the cosmos.
Listen to wisdom instead of nothingness.
Speak, and be judged.
I greet you with the blessings of eternity.
Why do we fight when we are bound to each other?
Surely there's something about INTEGR worth preserving?
This war is not sustainable.
Now we'll see who's truly willing to negotiate.
This is quite a complex situation, isn't it?
You've made a statement and we hear you.
War's not a good thing.
Oh, are you here about this little war we have?
Go ahead, I'm listening.
Can we not come to an understanding?
I'm not looking to make this a long affair.
This war is an interesting, but untenable problem.
What could you possibly hope to accomplish here?
I'm only giving you a few moments of my time.
We're hoping diplomacy can trump violence here.
You have our utmost attention.
Hello there, you fearsome warlord you.
You're lucky I'm patient.
I accept your unconditional surrender. That's why you're here, right?
All fun and games until someone loses a high-powered toy.
I thought you wanted to see me dead, not talking.
There are no winners in war.
We should discuss peace.
This war is pathetic, like you.
Parley?
The Slavic Federation is not here for war.
I did not expect to see you… unless, are you here for peace?
Why are you here when, we are at war? Have you come to make peace?
ARC does not recognize your authority, but we can negotiate peace.
So my adversary wants to talk? Go ahead, I'm listening…
Bon dia... but I'm guessing you're not here for niceties.
Must we be rivals, even as we are both children of humanity?
Welcome. We may be at war, but I'll hear what you have to say.
All right, what do you want, then?
I hope we can bring an end to this war.
You're not here for small talk, are you.
We are at war, what more do you want?
Are you sure?
We have not travelled so far to give up here. You must be left behind.
You are not good for this world. It is time you went back to sleep.
The cost-benefit analysis is clear. You're a net loss for this world, and it's time you were cut.
ARC has to preserve absolute authority within our sphere of operations. There's no room for you here anymore.
Though I may weep for your fate, I won't turn away from what must be done.
A worse fate awaits us all if I do not check you now.
It is time to settle this on the field. May the greater general win.
Brasilia will not shrink from any fight. Prepare yourself.
The game is over. The real contest now begins.
Our patience is at an end. You must be removed from play.
Please, don't insult me with protests. Accept the consequences of your folly with dignity.
Some people simply refuse to learn. I'd had enough of you, and your revolting colony.
All done pretending? So am I. Let's put it all on the table.
Disappointed? Not half as much as I am. I thought there was hope for you, but you sure proved me wrong.
We are finished with you. War begins now.
Did you think the Federation would not fight? You were wrong.
Politics has run its course. Let me simplify the situation for you.
I'll show you power you can't argue with. Maybe then you'll finally see things my way.
There is no longer a logical alternative. This is the only path with a probable expectation of success.
I'm sorry, but your resistance to our development has reached a critical point.
Our spirit has sufferend long enough from your reckless ways. Only the flame can cleanse you now.
It is time we return you to the void, before your evil ways poison us all.
Ye scunner, I hope you're ready for this. Time to put you down for good.
I'm fed up with this, with you, and with your blasted colony. Let's get down to it.
